resources.string: This Agreement outlines the terms related to your use of this Application provided to you by State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company ("State Farm"). 1. Your Privacy: - State Farm collects the following categories of information from your use of this Application: - Patterns of app usage and screen views; - Location; - Persistent Identifiers (Device ID, Android ID, etc.) - Device Details (Device Model, Operating System version, etc.) For further details about how State Farm handles your information, please view the privacy policy at 2. Your Obligations: - You Will: - Not modify, reverse engineer, create derivative works, or otherwise tamper with, the Application except as permitted under applicable open source licenses. - Not redistribute the Application in any way except as permitted under applicable open source licenses. - Comply with any applicable third party terms of agreement when using this Application. - You Are: - Solely responsible for any data charges as a result of your use of this Application. - At least 13 years old and located in the U.S. - Not listed on any U.S. Government list of prohibited or restricted parties. 3. Additional Terms: - This is a non-transferable license to use the Application
